name: get_book_recommendation
description: Call this tool to get a book recommendation from the backend system. Provide the user's request as 'message'. The backend will return a JSON object with the answer in response.output. Use ONLY the value of response.output as your reply to the user.

request_body_schema.description: The request body for a book recommendation via voice. Contains the user's transcribed request or question (as 'message') and an optional session_id for maintaining conversation context across multiple requests.

properties.description: A unique identifier for the user's session, used to maintain context across multiple requests. Optionalâ€”if not provided, the backend will generate a new session ID. Use the same session_id for follow-up questions to enable multi-turn conversations. Example: '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'

The user's request or question, as transcribed from their voice input. This should be a natural language string representing what the user said. Example: 'Can you recommend a book for a 10-year-old who likes adventure?'
